text: Marvin Cheung Kin-tung, GBS (2000), OBE (1994), JP (20 November 1947 â€“ 13 September 2014) was a Hong Kong businessman and civil servant. He was a Non- official Member of the Executive Council of Hong Kong. He was the Chairman of the Airport Authority Hong Kong and a Council Member of the Open University of Hong Kong. Cheung died in Hong Kong at the age of 67 from leukemia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Asia-Pacific Corporate Governance Conference * Hong Kong Executive/Marvin Cheung biodata * Business and Professionals Federation of Hong Kong * Tribute to Cheung from the Open University Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Hong Kong Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:Civil servants Category:Hong Kong businesspeople
title: Marvin Cheung
